name: Thai Quinoa
description: This one pot Thai quinoa is the perfect weeknight meal. It's super easy to make, so delicious, and incredibly healthy!
recipeIngredient: 1  red bell pepper, cut into medium-sized pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Place the quinoa, the vegetable broth, the coconut milk, the diced tomatoes, the red curry paste, and the curry powder in a large pot and stir well. Cook on medium heat (without a lid).
recipeInstructions.name: Place the quinoa, the vegetable broth, the coconut milk, the diced tomatoes, the red curry paste, and the curry powder in a large pot and stir well. Cook on medium heat (without a lid).

recipeInstructions.text: After 6 minutes, add the bell pepper, the beans, and the green onions.
recipeInstructions.name: After 6 minutes, add the bell pepper, the beans, and the green onions.

recipeInstructions.text: After 5 more minutes, add the broccoli. Stir well.
recipeInstructions.name: After 5 more minutes, add the broccoli. Stir well.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook 8-10 more minutes (on medium heat, no lid) or until the quinoa is ready. Season with salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook 8-10 more minutes (on medium heat, no lid) or until the quinoa is ready. Season with salt and pepper.
